attributes.title: Subramanya Learning from Paramashiva - No Questioning Paramashiva, Only Understand His Vision For Me
attributes.description:
24 MAY 2020

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM SHRIKAILASA:

*I WILL EXPAND ON THE FIRST FEW VERSES OF THE SARVAJNANOTTARA AGAMA, AS I ALREADY INITIATED ALL OF YOU INTO VIDYARAMBHA. NOW THIS IS सर्वज्ञानोत्तर अगम - विद्या पाद:, SARVAJNANOTTARA AGAMA : VIDYA PADA - FIRST VERSE

त्रिपदार्थ विचार प्रकरणम् 
TRIPADAARTHA VICHAARA PRAKARANAM

पशुपाश विधानंहि श्रोतुमिच्छामि तत्त्वतः 
संयोगं च तथा तेषां कथयस्व महेश्वर 

PASHUPAASHA VIDHAANAMHI SHROTUMICCHAAMI TATTVATAH
SAMYOGAM CA TATHAA TESHAAM KATHAYASVA MAHESHVARA

आद्याः पाशास्ततस्तेषां जीव आद्यस्तु किन्तु वै 
के पाशाः को मलः प्रोक्तः कस्माद्बद्धः पुमानिति 

AADYAAH PAASHAASTATASTESHAAM JEEVA AADYASTU KINTU VAI
KE PAASHAAH KO MALAH PROKTAH KASMAADBADDHAH PUMAANITI

पतिष्चा किं विधो ज्ञेयस्साधिकार पदे स्थितः  
शिवस्च  कीदृशः प्राक्ता योधिकार विवर्जितः 

PATISHCA KIM VIDHO JNEYASSAADHIKAARA PADE STHITAH 
SHIVASHCA KEEDRUSHAH PRAKTAA YODHIKAARA VIVARJITAH

I WANT YOU TO LISTEN TO THE ORIGINAL VERSES THAT IS WHY I AM RECITING.

*I WILL READ THE TRANSLATION:

*SUBRAHMANYA SON OF PARAMASHIVA IS ASKING PARAMASHIVA: “O, THE GREAT LORD, I AM INTENT ON HEARING FROM YOU THE ESSENTIAL AND IMMANENT NATURE OF THE BOUND SELF AND OF THE FETTERING BONDS AS THEY REALLY ARE. ALSO, EXPLAIN HOW THE SOULS AND THE BONDS GET LINKED.”

*THE LORD ASKED: “OF THESE TWO, PASHU AND PAASHA, WHICH DO YOU WANT TO HEAR FIRST, PAASHA OR PASHU?”

*LORD SKANDA REPLIED: “WHAT ARE THOSE BONDS? WHAT IS THAT WHICH IS VERY OFTEN TOLD AS MALA? FOR WHICH REASON THE SOULS GET CHAINED WITH THE LIMITING FACTORS?”

*“HOW THE ESSENTIAL NATURE OF PATI, WHO, BEING ESTABLISHED IN THE SPECIFIC STATE OF AUTHORITY, PERFORMS THE FIVEFOLD COSMIC FUNCTION, COULD BE KNOWN? HOW THE ESSENTIAL NATURE OF LORD SIVA WHO IS ABOVE AND FREE FROM THE SPECIFIC STATE OF AUTHORITY HAS BEEN EXPLAINED?”

*NOW I WILL ENTER INTO THE EXACT THE SPACE - BEING OF SUBRAHMANYA AND BEING OF PARAMASHIVA. 

*THERE ARE THREE THINGS:

PASHU, PAASHA, PATI:

PASHU - MEANS BOUND SOUL, THE SELF - ALL OF YOU WHO ARE EXPERIENCING LIMITATIONS BONDAGE

PAASHA - THE BONDAGE IMPURITY, PATTERNS, INCOMPLETIONS, KARMA, WHATEVER WORD WE MAY USE.

PATI - PARAMASAHIVA

*IN THESE THREE, SUBRAHMANYA IS ASKING, ‘EXPLAIN TO ME ABOUT PASHU AND PAASHA. I WANT YOU TO KNOW. HE IS NOT AT ALL ASKING ABOUT PATI - PARAMASHIVA. 

*YOU NEED TO KNOW THE SECRET INNER SPACE OF SUBRAHMANYA: 

*YESTERDAY I TOLD, ‘JUST BE LIKE SUBRAHMANYA FOR NEXT 16 DAYS, I WILL GIVE YOU EXACTLY WHAT PARAMASHIVA GAVE TO SUBRAMANYA THROUGH THIS AGAMA.’ AT NO TIME SUBRAHMANYA IS QUESTIONING ABOUT PATI. I WILL TELL YOU THE SECRET FROM MY OWN EXPERIENCE. EXACTLY I WILL MAP IT TO ATMA PRAMANA AND TELL YOU. NOW I HAVE TOLD YOU THE SHASTRA PRAMANA BY READING OUT THE SCRIPTURE. I WILL GIVE YOU THE APTA PRAMANA AND ATMA PRAMANA - BOTH
*ATMA PRAMANA - FROM MY EXPERIENCE: 
WHEN THERE WAS MURDER ATTEMPT ON ME BY THE ANTIHINDU DRAVISH AND SOME FORCES... I WILL NOT NAME THEM NOW... WHEN THEY ATTEMPTED TO KILL ME, BURN ASHRAM AND DESTROY THE SANGHA, SOCIALLY WE TRIED TO TAKE MANY ACTIONS. WE TRIED TO TAKE TO LOCAL POLICE AND TAKE ACTION, NOTHING COULD BE DONE. WE TRIED TO GO TO LOCAL INDIAN COURT. FOR YEARS NOTHING COULD BE DONE. WE TRIED EVERY POSSIBLE VENUE SOCIALLY. WE KNOCKED EVERY DOOR, EVERY POLITICIAN. WE TRIED TO TELL OUR STORY TO EVERYONE. WE BEGGED EVERYONE FOR JUSTICE. SOCIALLY HOW WE TRIED IS ONE THING. MORALLY HOW WE DEAL IS ONE THING. BUT ALL THAT IS EXTERNAL WORLD, OUTER WORLD RELATED. 

*HOW I HANDLED IT INSIDE ME, I AM OPENING THAT SECRET NOW. LISTEN. HOW I RESPONDED INSIDE ME, I AM OPENING NOW: FIRST THING, I RESPONDED TO PARAMASHIVA: “PARAMASHIVA, I AM VERY CLEAR ABOUT ONE THING. I WILL NOT QUESTION YOU. I WILL NOT DOUBT YOU. I WILL NEVER CONSCIOUSLY OR UNCONSCIOUSLY EVEN IN THE REMOTE CORNER OF MY MIND OR DREAM WILL POINT THE FINGER TOWARDS YOU OR TURN THE NEEDLE TOWARDS YOU. YOUR EXISTENCE AND YOUR ONENESS WITH ME AND YOU MANIFESTING IN ME, ALL THAT IS ABSOLUTE TRUTH. THERE IS NO DOUBT, QUESTION, NEGOTIATION, UP, DOWN IN THAT. IT IS A SEALED DEAL, OVER. I WILL ONLY QUESTION, DOUBT, THINK, OTHER THAN YOUR EXISTENCE. I WILL ONLY ASK: THROUGH THESE ATTACKS, YOU ARE ASKING ME TO DO SOME GREAT WORK. YOU ARE ASKING ME TO TAKE SOME MORE RESPONSIBILITY.
